languages.text: "Возможно, вас заинтересуют макропушки? Надежные и в очень, очень хорошем состоянии. С ними вы сокрушите любого врага!"
"Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"
languages.original_text: "Возможно, вас заинтересуют макропушки? Надежные и в очень, очень хорошем состоянии. С ними вы сокрушите любого врага!"

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"
"Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"
"Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"
"Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"
"Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"
"Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"

languages.text: "Kann ich Euch vielleicht für Makro-Kanonen begeistern? Solide, robust und in einem sehr, sehr guten Zustand. Mit ihnen würdet Ihr jeden Gegner mühelos vernichten!"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"

traits.locale_text: "Kann ich Euch vielleicht für Makro-Kanonen begeistern? Solide, robust und in einem sehr, sehr guten Zustand. Mit ihnen würdet Ihr jeden Gegner mühelos vernichten!"

languages.text: « Peut-être seriez-vous {mf|intéressé|intéressée} par des macro-canons ? Fiables, solides et en très, très bon état. Avec une telle puissance, vous êtes {mf|sûr|sûre} d'anéantir tous vos ennemis ! »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être seriez-vous {mf|intéressé|intéressée} par des macro-canons ? Fiables, solides et en très, très bon état. Avec une telle puissance, vous êtes {mf|sûr|sûre} d'anéantir tous vos ennemis ! »

languages.text: «¿Quizá le interesarían unos buenos macrocañones? Sólidos, robustos y en excelente estado. ¡Aplastará a cualquier enemigo con semejante potencia de su lado!».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Quizá le interesarían unos buenos macrocañones? Sólidos, robustos y en excelente estado. ¡Aplastará a cualquier enemigo con semejante potencia de su lado!».

languages.text: 「マクロキャノンにご興味はございませんか？堅固で、頑丈で、実に実に良い状態です。そのパワーを味方につければ、どんな敵でも粉砕できるでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"

traits.locale_text: 「マクロキャノンにご興味はございませんか？堅固で、頑丈で、実に実に良い状態です。そのパワーを味方につければ、どんな敵でも粉砕できるでしょう！」

languages.text: “或许您会对我们的宏炮感兴趣？它们非常结实，状态非常非常良好，它们的火力足以帮您打败任何敌人！”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"

traits.locale_text: “或许您会对我们的宏炮感兴趣？它们非常结实，状态非常非常良好，它们的火力足以帮您打败任何敌人！”

languages.text: "Makro toplar ilginizi çeker miydi? Taş gibi sapasağlamlar ve son derece iyi durumdalar. Bu gücü saflarınıza katarsanız önünüze çıkan tüm düşmanları ezip geçebilirsiniz!"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you might be interested in macro-cannons? Solid, robust and in very, very good condition. You will crush any enemy with their power at your side!"
